Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Comedy
Status: New Series
Network: BBC THREE ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Tuesdays at 10:00 pm
Runtime: 30 Minutes
Premiere: November 06, 2012

Some Girls is a comedy series broadcast on BBC THREE. The series following the life of Viva as she navigates the problems and pitfalls she faces on a daily basis as she grows up on a south London estate.
